name: Space Jam (itch)
description:
Join your friends for an awesome adventure through the cosmos and battle against radical aliens.

This is a 4 player co-op game and you must have access to the internet to play.

  • Collaborators:
  • Jose Bejar - UI programmer / Designer
  • Nathan Soriano - AI programmer / Network programmer
  • George Wulfers - Game play programmer / Network programmer
  • Randall Rivera - Composer / Sound Designer
